item.description:
Nikki Rasmussen is a Registered Nurse and owner of YOLO aesthetic boutique & med spa located in Guilford, CT. For most of her life, Nikki took comfort in the safety of working for others. It wasn't until she re-evaluated what her "true passion" was, that she decided to take the risk and opened up her own business, in one of the worst recessions of our lifetimes. Her business, was voted "Best New Business of 2009" by the local Chamber. Nikki attributes much of her success to the power of personal connections in Life and Business. YOLO or You Only Live Once is a motto she lives by.

Nikki will share her personal journey and how personal connections helped her to become a success!!

Come at 8:30am for socializing with other members. Speaker will begin at about 9am.

Meeting fee of $5 will be collected at the door.
item.name: October AWBL The Power of Personal Connections in Life and in Business
